name: Alivarya
description:
Brewery was founded in 1864 and is the oldest operating brewery in Belarus.

Today "Olivaria" produces 16 varieties of beer under the brands "Alivaria" and "Brewery". The portfolio of brands includes drink female " Eve ", owned by Carlsberg Group .

name: Arkell's Brewery
description:
Arkell’s Brewery is one of the few family breweries left in the UK.

Established as Brunel was building the Great Western Railway, Arkell’s is still brewing beer long after the railway works closed down.

name: Saarfürst Merziger Brauhaus am Yachthafen GmbH
Sarajevska Pivara
description:
Begining of the industrial development in Bosnia and Herzegovina started with the opening of Sarajevo brewery in 1864. Sarajevo brewery was the only European beer company to keep continued production in the periods of two empires: during the Otoman empire and the Austro-hungarian monarchy. By the end of 19th century, production at the Sarajevo brewery reached 22000 hl, prior the First World War production was at 116000 hl and in 1916 – it has climbed to 150000 hl. From 1965 to 1980, Sarajevo brewery has recorded a steady growth that dropped in period from 1980 to 1984.

I took over the Sarajevo brewery leadership in 1984. Steady growth during the following years reached from 299000 hl to 784000 hl in 1991. Agression on Bosnia and Herzegovina from 1992 to 1995 did not haltered the production and our natural water wells provided much needed clean water for the Sarajevo population. Latest war created damages to Sarajevo brewery esteemated 20 million dollars.

From 1995 to 2009, Sarajevo brewery strategic focus was to rebuild damages and to modernize company for what we invested over 80 million Euros. Today, Sarajevo brewery uses most modern technology combined with untouched traditional roots of water quality and tehnological processes.

In 1996, we have installed line producing concentrated juices and can filling. Iin 1997, we constructed facilities for filling the non-alchocolic beverages as well as PET packing with capacity for 12000 bottles / h. In 1998, we signed three year contract with Coca-Cola to service their production. From 1998 to 2002 Sarajevo brewery modernized our beer production line to „state of the art“ technology. In 2002, we signed an agreement with PepsiCo producing lines of refreshing and nonalcoholic drinks from Pepsi's program.

Today, Sarajevo brewery production has climbed significantly producing 800000 hl of beer and 1.000 000 hl of nonalcoholic and refreshing beverages per year.

Sarajevo beer has reached number of countries gaining more and more recognitions daily in Austria, Australia, Croatia, Serbia, Kazakhstan, Switzerland, The Netherlands, Kuwait, Libya, Slovenia, USA and others. Soon enough, number of other countries enjoying our superb beer will be added to this list.

name: Tivoli Brewing
description: The Tivoli Beer story traces its roots to 1864, when German immigrant Moritz Sigi founded a brewery in the newly settled town of Denver. Taken over in 1900 by John Good and renamed Tivoli, this brewery would become one of the largest breweries in the West, selling its light golden lager nearly everywhere west of the Mississippi until closing its doors in 1969. In 2012, a group of Colorado Natives formed the Tivoli Distributing Company to bring this Colorado legend back to life.
